---
title: How To's
---

For basic "how to" guides applicable to all NASA datasets, including PO.DAAC, visit the [NASA Earthdata Cloud Cookbook](https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/earthdata-cloud-cookbook/). Here you will find tutorials on how to find, transform, and access data locally or in the cloud.
